name: Plugin
description: Interface for configuring and managing plug-ins.After calling registerPlugin to register a plugin, you can get the Plugin interface through getPlugins.

parameters.setParameter: Set the plugin parameters. After calling getParameter to get the value, you can call this method to pass a JSON string containing a key and a value to the C++ layer.

parameters.getParameter: Get the plugin parameters. If you want to pass the JSON string to the C++ layer when using the plugin, you need to call this method to get the plugin parameters and then call setParameter to the parameters.
